sourcesContent:
<template lang="html">
  <v-dialog v-model="dialog">
    <template v-slot:activator="{ on }">
      <v-btn color="primary" dark v-on="on">Add New</v-btn>
    </template>
    <v-card>
      <v-form  @submit.prevent="onSubmit" v-if="newRPGroup != null">
        <v-row class="pa-4">
          <v-col :cols="7">
            <v-text-field
              label="Enter a name for your Risk Profile Group"
              single-line outlined dense
              v-model="newRPGroup.name" />
          </v-col>
          <v-col :cols="3">
            <v-btn type="submit" color="primary">Add</v-btn>
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
        <v-row
          class="pa-4"
          v-if="userID == null">
          <v-col :cols="7">
            <v-autocomplete
              label="AFSL Limitation"
              single-line outlined dense
              :items="AFSLList"
              item-text="name"
              item-value="id"
              v-model="newRPGroup.AFSL_limitation" />
          </v-col>
          <v-col :cols="3">
            <v-checkbox
              label="Default Template?"
              single-line outlined dense
              v-model="newRPGroup.default" />
          </v-col>
        </v-row>
      </v-form>
    </v-card>
  </v-dialog>
</template>

<script>
import { apiService } from "@/common/api.service.js";
export default {
  name: "AddRPGroup",
  props: {
    userID: {
      type: Array,
      required: false,
    },
    template: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: false,
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      newRPGroup: {},
      dialog: false,
      AFSLList: [],
    };
  },
  methods: {
    getUserID() {
      if (this.userID != null) {
        return [this.userID];
      } else {
        return [];
      }
    },
    getAFSLs() {
      let endpoint = `/api/afsls/`;
      apiService(endpoint).then(data => {
        this.AFSLList = data.results;
      });
    },
    onSubmit() {
      if (this.newRPGroup) {
        let endpoint = `/api/riskprofilegroups/`;
        apiService(endpoint, "POST", {
          name: this.newRPGroup.name,
          allowed_users: this.getUserID(),
          default: this.newRPGroup.default,
          AFSL_limitation: [this.newRPGroup.AFSL_limitation],
          template: this.template,
        }).then(data => {
          this.$emit("add-rpgroup", data);
          this.newRPGroup = null;
          this.dialog = false;
          console.log(data);
        });
        if (this.error) {
          this.error = null;
        }
      } else {
        this.error = "You must enter a name for the risk profile group.";
      }
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.getAFSLs();
  }
};
</script>
